doc.title: The Tour Girls
doc.plot: The adventures of 5 dancers as they leave Australia to tour throughout New Zealand, 13 venues in 13 days the girls and their managers take a wild ride around the country , with lots of dramas along the way, this fly on the wall series is Relaity TV with no setups or fake responses , this is exciting television with all the real life personalities and all the drama of life behind the scenes.
